TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimsAuthenticationManager extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定義宣告驗證管理員的基底實作。

span.span: Defines the base implementation for a claims authentication manager.

summary.span: 宣告驗證管理員在宣告處理提供處理管線中提供一個位置，用於在執行您的應用程式程式碼之前套用處理邏輯 (篩選、驗證、延伸) 至連入主體的宣告集合。

span.span: The claims authentication manager provides a place in the claims processing pipeline for applying processing logic (filtering, validation, extension) to the claims collection in the incoming principal before execution reaches your application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宣告驗證管理員提供的擴充點，在應用程式的宣告處理管線，您可以用來驗證、 篩選、 修改，連入宣告，或一組所呈現的宣告中插入新的宣告之前 RP應用程式程式碼會執行。The claims authentication manager provides an extensibility point in the application's claims processing pipeline that you can use to validate, filter, modify, incoming claims or inject new claims into the set of claims presented by a before the RP application code is executed. 您甚至可以傳回的自訂實作如果 RP 應用程式需要它。You can even return a custom implementation of if your RP application requires it. 所提供的預設實作類別會傳回中的宣告未經修改的狀態; 不過，您可以從這個類別衍生並覆寫方法，以修改中的宣告（或傳回自訂).The default implementation provided by the class returns the claims in the unmodified; however, you can derive from this class and override the method to modify the claims in the (or to return a custom ). 建立自訂宣告驗證管理員的一般原因是要新增、 移除或轉換才知道的或，或許更好維護的 RP 應用程式的資訊為基礎的宣告。A typical reason for creating a custom claims authentication manager is to add, remove, or transform claims based on information that is only known by or is, perhaps, better maintained by the RP application. 比方說，可能會保留的購物車應用程式中的客戶購買記錄中的資料由 RP 應用程式維護，然後加入所根據的值中找到名稱宣告的宣告驗證管理員傳回的宣告主體連入的主體。For example, a history of customer purchases in a shopping cart application might be kept in a data base maintained by the RP application and then added to the claims principal returned by the claims authentication manager based on the value of a name claim found in the incoming principal. 您可以設定應用程式以使用`ClaimsAuthenticationManager`程式設計的方式是藉由使用類別或透過組態[ <claimsAuthenticationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md)項目 (這是子項目[ <Identityconfiguration>> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)項目)。You can configure your application to use a `ClaimsAuthenticationManager` either programmatically by using the class or in configuration through the [<claimsAuthenticationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md) element (which is a child element of the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element). 您可以覆寫方法，以提供自訂的子系項目處理``您自訂的管理員可以設定透過此項目。You can override the method to provide processing for custom child elements of the `` element through which your custom manager can be configured. 基底實作不會處理任何子項目。The base implementation of does not handle any child elements. 設定您的應用程式使用宣告驗證管理員可確保，它會從叫用 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 要求管線。Configuring your application to use a claims authentication manager ensures that it will be invoked by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) from the request pipeline. ## Examples 下列程式碼顯示簡單的宣告驗證管理員新增到傳入主體的角色宣告，而不執行任何檢查連入宣告上...The following code shows a simple claims authentication manager that adds a role claim to the incoming principal without performing any check on the incoming claims.. [!code-csharp[WifWebApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwebapplication1/cs/myclaimsauthenticationmanager/simpleclaimsauthenticatonmanager.cs#1)] 下列 XML 會說明``項目。The following XML shows the `` element. ```xml ... ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal Authenticate (string resourceName, System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal incomingPrincipal);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal Authenticate(string resourceName, class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal incomingPrincipal) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Authenticate (resourceName As String, incomingPrincipal As ClaimsPrincipal) As ClaimsPrincipal
public: virtual System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ resourceName, System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ incomingPrincipal);

abstract member Authenticate : string * System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal -> System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal override this.Authenticate : string * System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal -> System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal

span.span: The address of the resource that is being requested.

param.name: incomingPrincipal
param.span: 宣告主體，代表嘗試存取資源的驗證使用者。

span.span: The claims principal that represents the authenticated user that is attempting to access the resource.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回符合 RP 應用程式需求的 物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a object consistent with the requirements of the RP application.

summary.span: 預設實作不會修改連入的 。

span.span: The default implementation does not modify the incoming .

returns.span: 包含 RP 應用程式所需之任何修改的宣告主體。

span.span: A claims principal that contains any modifications necessary for the RP application.

returns.span: 預設實作會傳回未修改的連入宣告主體。

span.span: The default implementation returns the incoming claims principal unmodified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫從您可以覆寫這個方法來篩選在衍生類別中的要求處理管線，請修改或插入的宣告主體，根據您的 RP 應用程式的原則中的宣告。The method is called from the request processing pipeline You can override this method in a derived class to filter, modify, or inject claims into the claims principal according to the policy of your RP application. 根據 RP 應用程式的需求，您甚至可以傳回的自訂實作。Depending on the requirements of the RP application, you can even return a custom implementation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (nodelist As XmlNodeList)
abstract member LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit override this.LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit

param.name: nodelist
param.span: 清單中的每個節點的型別為 。

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從 XML 載入自訂組態。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <claimsAuthenticationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md)從組態檔的項目。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<claimsAuthenticationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md) element from the configuration file. 每個這些項目可能會包含屬性或子項目，根據您為您的衍生類別定義組態結構描述。Each of these elements may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 如果任何子項目不出現在``組態檔中的項目，這個方法不會呼叫。If no child elements appear under the `` element in the configuration file, this method is not called. 預設實作會擲回。The default implementation throws a . 覆寫此方法，以啟用從組態檔宣告驗證管理員的初始化衍生類別中。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your claims authentication manager from a configuration file. 比方說，組態項目可能會描述要驗證的宣告主體; 時遵循的原則或者，它們可能用來指向從中額外的宣告會新增至主體的屬性存放區。For example, the configuration elements might describe a policy to be followed when authenticating a claims principal; or they might be used to point to an attribute store from which additional claims are to be added to the principal.
